abstract: Federal judge rejects former Sen John Edwards's request to dismiss criminal campaign finance charges against him, all but ensuring that Edwards will go to trial.
snippet: A judge rejected former Senator John Edwards’s request to dismiss criminal campaign finance charges, all but insuring that he will go to trial in January.
lead_paragraph: A judge rejected former Senator John Edwards’s request to dismiss criminal campaign finance charges, all but insuring that he will go to trial in January.

headline.main: Edwards Loses Bid to Get Campaign Case Dismissed
headline.print_headline: Edwards Loses Bid to Get Campaign Case Dismissed
headline.seo: John Edwards Loses Bid to Get Campaign Finance Case Dismissed
